body:
The biggest change in this release is the [upgrade to cel-python 0.2.0](https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-python/pull/252), which should help with some of the [extraneous logging](https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-python/issues/180) that users may have noticed.

## What's Changed
* Bump mypy from 1.14.1 to 1.15.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-python/pull/250
* Bump types-protobuf from 5.29.1.20241207 to 5.29.1.20250208 by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-python/pull/251
* Bump ruff from 0.9.4 to 0.9.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-python/pull/249
* Bump ruff from 0.9.5 to 0.9.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-python/pull/253
* Pass `--strict_message` conformance (minus duration/timestamp) by @stefanvanburen in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-python/pull/256
* Bump gencode to 29.3 by @stefanvanburen in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-python/pull/258
* Bump ruff from 0.9.6 to 0.9.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-python/pull/259
* Upgrade cel-python to 0.2.0 by @stefanvanburen in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-python/pull/252


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-python/compare/v0.7.0...v0.7.1
name: v0.7.1
